ygData.subject: Research Tips
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone got any reseach tips to share?  How to train it and how much skill u need b4 u got a high chance (say 80%) to research a particular lvl spell? Believe
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone got any reseach tips to share? How to train it and how much skill u
need b4 u got a high chance (say 80%) to research a particular lvl spell?

Believe it or not, at lvl 29 I never do a single research so far and I got
all the necessary spells (as a nuker and traveller) I need, either buying
from wiz guild or getting from 'some' other sources ;)

Say now I never train or use research skill b4, shld I dump in max skill
points (and pay pp also) to max out the skill 1st, or ???

TIA!

Ziltus

p/s: VS guild is formed last night, with 10 kakis, with GM Sereph the flat
chest babe, hehe. To faciliate discussion with non SG kakis (FF & DF) and
SG kakis in overseas (Nica), I propose a guild chat in EQ over the weekend
to sort things out, preferably last night Fri or Sat.
